title: Hello Oce Only Corki god here, I have to come out of the closet.
body:
So for years now I've caged who I really am deep down inside, and with recent times and the acceptance of equality I believe it is now time for me to come out, I'm too scared to coem out IRL at the moment so I'm going to just come out on the OCE forums and share this with the community that I love and cherish so dearly.

Well... Here goes...
...

I want to announce today that I am officially no longer a man or white but I am a C.H.U.D... Since I was a small child I knew deep inside that I was actually a Cannibalistic / Humanoid / Underground / Dweller. I don’t mean to disappoint my fans but this is what I was born to be. Anyone who addresses me as anything besides C.H.U.D from now on will be labeled a “C.H.U.D-A-Phobe”. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OR-ddHPcqYo

If you don't accept me you're the problem!

And to my fellow minorities, if you wanna take a dik in the asss that's between you and whoever elses dick it is, I STILL LOVE YOU, and for my ladies out there, if you wanna try out that 12 inch strap on with the flashing led lights and vibration on your spouce, I WON'T JUDGE! EQUALITY FOR ALL.

replies.body: hi, i am glad you have dreams, it is nice to have dreams but we should never forget reality my friend, glad i could help - ur welcome
